title: XDC Study definition
description: ECRIN Metadata Repository for clinical research objects, Study JSON definition, version 5 October 2020

id.description: Internal accession number of the study within the MDR database

display_title.description: By default the public or brief study title. If that is missing then the full scientific title, as used on the protocol document

brief_description.description: Brief description, usually a few lines, of the study

text.description: Text of the description. For some sources may need to be derived from key study features

contains_html.description: Indicates if there are embedded html tags in the description text, as an aid to display management

data_sharing_statement.description: A statement from the sponsor and / or study leads about their intentions for IPD sharing

text.description: Text of the statement (may be structured in some sources)

contains_html.description: Indicates if there are embedded html tags in the data sharing text, as an aid to display management

study_type.description: Categorisation of study type, e.g. 'Interventional', or 'Observational'

id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the study_types enumeration / lookup table

name.description: One of the types listed in the study_types enumeration

study_status.description: Categorisation of study status, e.g. 'Active, not recruiting', or 'Completed'

id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the study_statuses enumeration / lookup table

name.description: One of the statuses listed in the study_statuses enumeration

study_enrolment.description: The anticipated or actual total number of participants in the clinical study.

study_gender_elig.description: Whether the study is open to all genders, or just male or female

id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the gender_eligibility_types enumeration / lookup table

name.description: One of the types from the gender_eligibility_types enumeration

min_age.description: The minimum age, if any, for a study participant

value.description: The numerical value of the age

unit_id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the time_units enumeration / lookup table

unit_name.description: One of the allowed types, from the time_units enumeration, e.g. 'Months', or 'Years'

max_age.description: The maximum age, if any, for a study participant

value.description: The numerical value of the age

unit_id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the time_units enumeration / lookup table

unit_name.description: One of the allowed types, from the time_units enumeration, e.g. 'Months', or 'Years'

items.description: A composite object that indicates the value and type of the identifier, and optionally its date and organisation of origin

id.description: Study identifier record primary key, generated automatically in database

identifier_value.description: The identifier value, in a standardised format (for each identifier type)

identifier_type.description: The category of the identifier, e.g. 'Trial Registry ID', or 'Sponsor ID'

id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the identifier_types enumeration / lookup table

name.description: One of the types in the identifier_types enumeration.

id.description: The id of the organisation within the ECRIN context database, if that id exists

name.description: The default name of the organisation within the ECRIN context database, if it exists, or the name of the organisation as supplied by the source data

identifier_date.description: The date the identifier was allocated, if known, in a string 'yyyy  MMM dd' format, e.g. '2015 Dec 12'

identifier_link.description: Any URL associated with the identifier

items.description: A composite object that indicates the type and value of any study title

id.description: study title record primary key, generated automatically in database

title_type.description: Type of the title, e.g. 'Abbreviation or Acronym', or 'Translated Title'

id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the title_types enumeration / lookup table

name.description: One of the types listed in the title_types enumeration

title_text.description: The text of the title, verbatim

lang_code.description: A two letter ISO 369-1 code indicating the language of the title

comments.description: Any additional comments regaring the souce or derivation of the title

items.description: A composite object that indicates the type and value of any study feature - usually a design feature, often used for filtering

id.description: Study feature record primary key, generated automatically in database

feature_type.description: The type of study feature, e.g. 'Phase', or 'Masking'

id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the study_feature_types enumeration / lookup table

name.description: One of the features listed in the study_feature_types enumeration

feature_value.description: The value of the feature, as taken from a pre-defined list, e.g. 'Phase 3', or 'Double'

id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the study_feature_categories enumeration / lookup table

name.description: One of the allowed values listed in the relevant part of the  study_feature_categories enumeration

items.description: A composite object that indicates the topic name or keyword, and - where available - the MESH coding for that term

id.description: Study topic record primary key, generated automatically in database

topic_type.description: How the topic was categorised in the source data, e.g. 'Condition', or 'Organism'

id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the topic_source_types enumeration / lookup table

name.description: One of the allowed types listed in the topic_source_types enumeration

mesh_coded.description: Whether or not the topic has been MESH coded

topic_code.description: The MESH code for the topic if one exists

topic_value.description: The topic or keyword value or name, as a MESH term if coded, otherwise as provided in the source data

topic_qualcode.description: Any MESH qualifier code, if one has been applied

topic_qualvalue.description: Any MESH qualifier term, if one has been applied

original_value.description: The original value of the term, whether coded or not

items.description: A composite object that indicates any related study and the nature of the relationship

id.description: Study relationships record primary key, generated automatically in database

relationship_type.description: The nature of the relationship, e.g. 'Is a sub-study of', or 'has an expanded access version

id.description: An integer referencing the relevant record in the study_relationship_types enumeration / lookup table

name.description: One of the allowed types from the study_relationship_types enumeration

target_study_id.description: The id, i.e. internal accession number, of the related study

items.description: The id, i.e. internal accession number, of the linked data object

provenance_string.description: A listing of the source or sources (usually a trial registry) from which the data for the study has been drawn, and the date-time(s) when the data was last downloaded
